abstract: Gareth Cook reviews book Rethink: The Surprising History of New Ideas by Steven Poole.

keywords.value: Rethink: The Surprising History of New Ideas (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: “Rethink” is the British journalist Steven Poole’s attack on what he calls a “Silicon Valley ideology.”

headline.main: There Are No New Ideas, Only Rediscoveries
